entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:56 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:39 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets late in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
